about_the_game:
Out of Jail is a multiplayer game that is in development, where the objective is to escape from prison together with other players by solving different challenges in each match. One player in the match will take on the role of the prison guard and must prevent the players from escaping the prison.

So, how you and your friends faced these challenges

(3-8 players)

Prisoners vs Guard

While you try to find a way out of jail, you need be careful with the prison guard. NPC guards aren't as well paid as player prison guards, so they won't do you anything, but beware, who knows who is player or NPC.

Playing as prison guard role will have some disadvantages.

Features


  • Different challenges each match
    Each match is different from the previous, the ways to escape are different, you'll need to break your head together with your friends.

  • Nearby VOIP
    You hear who's close, you can scream - but be careful, the guard can hear.

  • Craft items
    Using creativity and improvised pieces found or traded with other inmates (NPC), you will create items to help solve the challenges.

  • Who is player?
    NPCs simulating other players will confuse the prison guard, you can take the opportunity to provoke a riot and go unnoticed by the guards among the NPCs

Prison Guard
  • Cameras
    Monitor the complex's security cameras and try to identify any suspicious activity.

  • Security room
    Sound the emergency siren, close all cells, send everyone to their cells, all from the security room.

  • Eletric chair
    Is someone doing work? How about taking him to the electric chair, but be careful, other players will be able to save before the chair is ready.
detailed_description:
About development

I'm developing the game completely independently, without any studio or distributor, and my goal is to develop this game actively together with the community, listening to the most important person for Out Of Jail, you!

Roadmap


    Basic Mechanics (The development is here)
  • Basic controls.
  • Multiplayer system and private matches.
  • Item and inventory system
  • And a few more things.

    First playable version
  • First map: cells, cafeteria, sunbathing and others.
  • Challenge systems: Easier challenges for a first playable version.
  • And a few more things.

    First public version
  • Improvements to the challenges system with some more complex ones.
  • Closed beta improvements and fixes.
  • And a few more things.
